title: Create Social Media Posts with Hashtags
original_prompt:
Create a {What is the social media platform to be used?:Instagram} post {What is the reason of the post?:share about my wonderful staycation experience in Hatta Resort}.

Output should include relevant hashtags.
input1: "Just spent an amazing weekend at Hatta Resort! The serene mountains, crystal-clear lakes, and cozy accommodations made for the perfect staycation. Can't wait to go back! #HattaResort #Staycation #NatureLovers #TravelDiaries #ExploreUAE"
input2: "Had the most relaxing time at Hatta Resort! From kayaking on the lake to enjoying a sunset by the mountains, every moment was magical. Highly recommend for anyone looking to unwind! #HattaResort #StaycationGoals #AdventureAwaits #UAEGetaway #Wanderlust"
input1_ans: 🌄✨ Just spent an amazing weekend at Hatta Resort! The serene mountains, crystal-clear lakes, and cozy accommodations made for the perfect staycation. From hiking trails to relaxing by the water, every moment was a dream! Can't wait to go back! 🏞️💚 #HattaResort #Staycation #NatureLovers #TravelDiaries #ExploreUAE #WeekendGetaway #AdventureAwaits #UAETravel #InstaTravel #Wanderlust

"Just spent an amazing weekend at Hatta Resort! The serene mountains, crystal-clear lakes, and cozy accommodations made for the perfect staycation. Can't wait to go back! 🌄🏞️✨ #HattaResort #Staycation #NatureLovers #TravelDiaries #ExploreUAE #WeekendGetaway #AdventureAwaits #InstaTravel"
input2_ans:
🌄✨ Just wrapped up an incredible staycation at Hatta Resort! From kayaking on the serene lake to soaking in the breathtaking sunset views by the mountains, every moment was pure magic. 🌊🏞️ If you're looking to unwind and escape the hustle and bustle, this is the perfect spot! Highly recommend it! 💖

#HattaResort #StaycationGoals #AdventureAwaits #UAEGetaway #Wanderlust #NatureLovers #TravelDiaries #ExploreUAE #RelaxationMode #MountainViews
